task.title: Cut Objects
task.shortdesc: You can use Window commands such as Cut, Copy and Paste to move or copy objects. With using the Cut command, the objects on the clipboard can be pasted to a document or drawing as an OLE object. See more from the PASTECLIP and PASTESPEC command. The links are not available after executing the Cut command.

context.p: To cut objects to the Clipboard

step.cmd: Select the objects youwant to cut.
Choose Edit > Cut from the main menu.
